stories.text:
Just wondering what could be the issue here:

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/min()

Actually, I get the same error when trying to access max() also. I tried it in 4 different browser variations and all return the same error: "developer.mozilla.org redirected you too many times."
stories.title: Ask HN: Is the min() CSS reference on MDN broken?

stories.text:
Since Android 12, I can charge my phone (s10e) up to 85% instead of 100%. Is there any studies on how much this is improving battery life expectancy?

I can also do this on my laptop: up to 60% or 85%. Same question.

Any studies on how much those should impact battery life?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is charging my phone to 85% saving battery life expectancy?
